name: Photo Finish Primerizer+ Hydrating Face Primer with Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is:A hydrating primer with a fresh, dewy finish that defends skin and perfects makeup..Highlighted Ingredients:- Silkscreen Complex (Antioxidants, Hyaluronic Acid, Probiotic Extract, Vitamins, and Algae): Nourishes, visibly balances, and defends skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Powered by nourishing, protective, visibly balancing Silkscreen Complex, this primer forms a breathable, silky barrier that perfects the look of skin, smoothing and defending against damage from environmental aggressors like pollution and blue light. The silicone-free formula replenishes skinu2019s moisture reserve for a smooth, plump, glowing look.
ingredients: -Silkscreen Complex (Antioxidants, Hyaluronic Acid, Probiotic Extract, Vitamins, and Algae): Nourishes, visibly balances, and defends skin..-Triple Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and visibly plumps for up to 72 hours. .-Niacinamide: Nourishes skin...Water/Aqua/Eau, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Isopropyl Isostearate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Niacinamide, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Sodium Polyaspartate, Algae Extract, Caffeine, Lactobacillus Ferment, Yeast Extract/Faex/Extrait De Levure, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, Rosa Hybrid Flower Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pantethine, Sorbitol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Propanediol, Nylon-12, Silica, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Smooth over clean skin. .-Wear alone or under makeup for visibly plumping hydration.

reviews.review_text: I use to be a Smashbox fan and loved their primer. I purchased this one for my dry skin. I washed my face and moisturized prior to using it. I found it to be very runny, but it applied well. Once all of my makeup was done, my husband and I couldn't help but notice I had aged about 20 years. I made every imperfection and line appear, and the product sat very dry on my skin. It's just very uncomfortable hours later, feeling a little like dried mud. I'm glad I bought the mini to try but will definitely switch brands. A huge waste of money for sure for a terrible product :(
I bought this for the dry skin under my eyes. It made the skin dry, red, itchy and flaky. My dermatologist looked at every product I was using and instantly identified this as the problem.
After using this product under my eyes as a primer I notice they donu2019t get as dry throughout the day as what they do with other primers

reviews.review_title: Not moisturizing enough for Mature skin
reviews.review_text: Got the mini size to try it out. I've got dry, mature, 50+ skin and this was not the product for me. Lightweight, non greasy but was not moisturizing enough for my dry skin. Also not great value- small amount of product for the price. I really like other Smashbox products but this was not for me
Left my face looking extremely glowy and dewy. Loved this primer mini and will be purchasing the full size to use for my makeup and no-makeup routine.

I haven't tried it yet, but since I ordered it online, I didn't realize what a tiny little thing this is for $20! Since its been shipped and already here, I'll just keep it because returning is going to cost me gas money just to get it to a store. And we all know, these products are hyper marked up to account for free shipping expenses. But this is a travel size. In my photos, for reference, I have the original smashbox pore minimizer primer I bought 2 years ago, and just bought the larger hydrating primer after I received this dinky one and got it in the mail maybe a day or two ago. The large sizes are both 1 fl. oz. Its literally more than half of the new one. They are cutting corners on cost to consumers! The green primer that reduces redness, I had bought 5 years ago, when things were normal priced. Look at the size difference. This travel size hydrating primer is only .34 fl. oz or 10mL. Even though, the green primer doesn't show the size and I've thrown away the original packaging, its most likely at least .5 fl oz, or 15mL. Just see the difference! They cut corners by 1/3rd and hoped nobody would notice. I was going to give 2 stars, but actually, changed my mind because of consumer and marketing engineering practices. But still charging half price for 1/3rd of its original product.  I've always been a Sephora fan, but they have price competitors now, and the free samples suck now. Not to mention, the online shops don't give enough information. Their web team is lazy, barely providing enough graphic images, and relying on the customer to read every single label. Naturally easier in-store because you can pick it up, see it in-person, and sample it... etc. Online shopping, not an easy experience. So I am going to be looking at other options that are more competitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this Photo Finish Primerizer + Hydrating Face Primer from Smashbox! I love that this primer has triple hyaluronic acid + niamiacide for giving me super hydrated skin. It also has a silkscreen complex that helps balance skin, boost hydration, along with protecting against environmental stressors like pollution and blue light. I smoothed it over my clean skin & it leaves my skin feeling so fresh, hydrated, and absorbed beautifully into my skin. It makes my skin healthy looking with a soft dewy finish, along with providing a breathable veil that helps smooth + blur imperfections, and it helps my makeup glide on easier and keeps it in place for for a longer period of time. I also like that it is vegan, and is cruelty-free. I would highly recommend this hydrating primer to others, and I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_text: Thank you influencer for making me part of this #Smashbox campaign.  If you don't have problems with pores, just struggle with oily skin, I think this is the first one for you. It is an extra that they help you with excess oil or reduce the appearance of pores The Smashbox primer is much better than Maybelline or Benefit primers to reduce excess oil, so it depends a lot on that extra that you want to give your skin to select a highly recommended primer

reviews.review_text: I was recently sent the Smashbox Primerizer+ Hydrating primer by Influenster, this is a makeup primer + a skincare serum combined into one. This primer also played well under my go to foundation, I paired my Estee Lauder Double Wear Sheer and skipped any setting powders. It sets to a beautiful dewy finish that looks natural but still covers any skin tone issues. My only qualm is the price tag, $40 is a very high price for what is basically your standard niacinamide serum. Iu2019ve also attached a final picture from a day I wore my sheer foundation alone with no primer, and there is practically no difference in the end result. I definitely feel a bit more hydrated wearing the primer underneath, but I was not wowed enough to put this on my list of things to repurchase. #SmashboxPrimer #PrimedFor #complimentary @Smashboxcosmetics @Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello hydration! I used expensive primers in my early teens and was not impressed. They left my skin oily and heavy. My use of primer was short lived. Fast forward to my late 20u2019s now. I was curious about primers since influencers swear by them. I asked an associate to recommend a primer for a noob and he showed me to the sample size. The tube lasted several uses since it doesnu2019t require much. I applied it all over my face and instantly felt silky smooth and powder fresh. I was planning on using a foundation but my skin looked so great, I decided to go without. I did a light powder eyeshadow and saw no creases hours later. Half way through the sample tube, I noticed my skin appeared much healthier and had less break outs. I bought this same product for my teenaged cousin with oily skin. She began using it and had the same results. Her acne cleared up tremendously. Iu2019m still using this product a year later. I hope this helps you decide to buy. At least try it.

reviews.review_text: This new hydrating primer is soo amazing! I love it in the winter because my skin gets dry. The packaging is very sleek and pretty! So if you are an oily girl but still get dry skin this is a winner for you. It won't make you greasy. I love how it has a skincare complex in it as well so you don't have to worry about a long skincare routine before makeup. It takes care of all that. It has triple hyaluronic acid, silkscreen complex, niacinamide, algae, caffeine, lactobacillus ferment, yeast extract and lycium Chinese fruit extract. It really does help blur your skin and give a flawless finish. I highly recommend if you're looking for a hydrating but non greasy primer. They also have other primers if you want other concern areas taken care of if you dont need the hydration complex. But I love it since it helps cut the time of worrying about skincare and has such a wonderful effect!

A created silky barrier and made my skin look more smooth, however I would definitely recommend always finishing off with the sunscreen on top. This blurred my imperfections and helped make up and concealer and light on and look better. Be aware that this is not an alternative for sunscreen, it just helps strengthen your skin against damage from environmental aggressors like pollution and blue light, but always follow up with SPF 30 or more.

While this hasnu2019t become a holy grail product, it feels weightless and moisturizing, and Iu2019ll definitely use it up. It made my makeup last decently over 8-hour wear. reviews.review_text: When I received this complimentary from Influenster, I was confused as to whether this was the same as the original Smashbox Primerizer. I put some of the og and some of this on the back of my hand and they smelt and felt the same. I ended up comparing the ingredient list of the two and this one seems like an extended list of the original with some extra ingredients.   Personally, I can't tell a difference. If you like the og, I think you will enjoy this: a thin moisturizing drink of hydration for your skin before makeup. I will say that this packaging feels a lot cheaper than the glass bottle of the original. In the winter this isn't enough for me but I still enjoy mixing it with thicker foundations to sheer them out or make them more spreadable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for reviewing purposes, and tried the product on the same day I got it which was Christmas Eve so I used it for my Christmas Eve and Christmas Day makeup looks, and I did like how it worked with the foundation I used which was Charlotte Tilbury Airflawless foundation. I liked how the primer smoothed my pores and also hydrated my face because foundations do get cakey on my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from influenster to give my honest opinion and her it is. i love smashbox products, but sadly this one didnu2019t do it for me. With it being winter i was excited to have something more hydrating and also get a more natural hydrated look for my light coverage looks, but this primer, perhaps counteracting with my moisturizer, it was pilling, which is annoying. I tried different amounts, but somehow still did it. i only targeted my forehead my last try and used a tiny tiny amount and it was okay. I honestly am not in u201caweu201d of this primer, there a many other products out there that give more for half the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok wow. So I have this one primer that is my ride or die for years and no product has compared. But this oneu2026 It gives it a run for its money. I look so glowy and dewy. My products layer and blend BEAUTIFULLY on top of it. It has a bit of tackiness that helps my concealer grip onto my skin better. I donu2019t look greasy or sweaty, just fresh and hydrated. Seriously obsessed with this product. I did get sent it for free, so would I purchase it w my own money? 7289952%. But also no because Iu2019m broke hahaha. Oh yeah and my skin feels amazing w it. It isnu2019t heavy or uncomfortable, just feels like an extra layer of moisturizer. Honestly Iu2019d wear it w out any makeup over it bc It looks that good hahah

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary gift from Influenster. I love this product so much. It applies very nicely and leaves my skin with a smooth finish. I typically wear this under makeup and I notice that my makeup tends to last a lot longer! My skin is naturally dry in the colder months and this really does a great job of restoring and hydrating my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product for free in return for my honest opinion* My skin loved this, especially since winter has caused it to be dry lately! This primer is very hydrating, but not greasy at all. I also like that you can use this to spot-correct dry areas if you have combination skin. Overall, it was a really nice product and Iu2019m glad I got to try it!

reviews.review_title: Not a great combo with my skincare
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this product, because I have a smashbox primer already that I absolutely love! I especially liked that it was a hydrating primer because I like The Dewy skin look as opposed to a matte finish. Unfortunately no matter how many times I tried to combine this with different foundations or different skin products it always peeled up and made my foundation look cakey. With my other primers or even with bare skin I never have a problem with makeup going into my pores or caking up, but with this primer it immediately made everything form into small balls all over my face and look very uneven. The effect seemed to smooth out a little as I wore it throughout the day, maybe from the heat of my skin or something, but it definitely didn't smooth my skin and make my makeup look better, if anything it made my makeup look more fake. I gave it three stars because it is decently moisturizing and it doesn't feel like I've put a heavy greasy product on my face like some of the primers do. I use a lot of Korean skin care which is very dewy and moisturized so it may just be the skin care products that I'm using alongside it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Smashbox and Influenster to review in exchange for my honest opinion. Ive been using it for 2 weeks now and I love it!  My finished look after applying makeup looks smoother,  last longer and my skin feels moisturized under my matte foundation. It's super light weight and it applies and absorbs very well on my dry areas. Also a little goes a long way as it has more of a gel/water consistency rather than thick and oily like a lotion. I have already recommended this to my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this complementary of Influenster in exchange of my honest review. It is very hydrating and did well as a primer. But if you have oily skin such as your face or oily before the day is up, then I wouldn't recommend this product. It did well with my skin with no giving me a break out,but I have combination skin so by the end of the I had that oily and shinny look which I don't like

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

The ingredients are very light in my opinion compared to many other primers which is good considering I have mix/oily skin. Overall It made my face look natural and hydrated !!

This product doesnu2019t clog the skin and made it look amazing!

reviews.review_title: Perfect primer for dry skin with pours.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have found this Smashbox New Photo Finish Primer an ideal match for my very sensitive skin. Itu2019s Silkscreen Complex helps the skin strengthening against environmental aggressors like pollution and blue light. I have dry to combo skin with pores. It absorbs right into the skin within no time leaving it soft, dewy and hydrated. The foundation stays put whether itu2019s creamy, liquid or compact. The primer does not make foundation pill or crease which is a big plus. Iu2019m really enjoying wearing Smashbox Primerizer both under my foundation or just on itu2019s own over the sunscreen due to its powerful ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this primer I have dry skin and when apply makeup sometimes see how the foundation look dry on the skin as well and this fix it. Use it to hydrate my skin even without makeup.

reviews.review_text: really like this primer! I like the fresh-faced look it gives me and will start to incorporate into my makeup routine!
